content: संज् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (सजति, सक्त; the स् of the root being changed to ष् after a preposition ending in इ or उ) {@--1@} To stick or adhere to, cling to; तुल्यगंधिषु मत्तेभकटेषु फलरेणवः (ससंजुः); <ls>R. 4. 47.</ls> {@--2@} To go, move. {@--3@} To fasten. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} (सज्यते) To be attached to, cling or adhere to.
